Notes.Text:
This update for samba fixes the following issues:

The username map advice from the CVE-2020-25717 advisory
note has undesired side effects for the local nt token. Fallback
to a SID/UID based mapping if the name based lookup fails (bsc#1192849).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: A flaw was found in the way Samba maps domain users to local users. An authenticated attacker could use this flaw to cause possible privilege escalation.
